New Records: James Harden connected on the 2,974th 3-pointer of his career, breaking a tie with Ray Allen for the No. 2 spot on the NBA’s career 3-point list.
Key Match Events: James Harden's history-making shot came from the right wing with 6:09 left in the first quarter in a 116-105 victory over the Utah Jazz.
James Harden finished the game with 20 points, 11 assists, and six rebounds.
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden expressed his pride in the accomplishment, stating, 'It’s an unbelievable accomplishment and just a testament to the work that I’ve been putting in.'
Clippers coach Tyronn Lue praised Harden's versatility and achievements, saying, 'To be a scorer at all three levels and to be second all-time in 3-pointers made is crazy.'
